TopicTitle: New Forum User, Kind of Experienced Player

Articles.Content:
Hey Everyone!

I have been lurking these forums for well over a year now, and I am glad to finally be a part of the forum here. I am a rather casual player, in the sense that I enjoy testing new designs and worry less about the math behind them (although I am learning/have learned a whole lot from and about the game since I have started).

I have played since 0.19.1, and have loved seeing the evolution of the game since. I hope to become a (kind of) useful addition to the community!

Happy flying!
Welcome to the KSP forums Dan! Here we have Kerbals.
